description:
Monitor spatial and temporal status of Didymosphenia geminata mat production / formation in the Kootenai River downstream of Libby Dam.  Sample all sites and sections approximately mid-month when flows and conditions allow (< 15 kcfs).

Randomly sample substrates at each site.  Estimate the percent (%) coverage by D. geminata on the dorsal surface of each substrate particle.  Estimate the periphyton thickness (mm) on each substrate particle by making representative measurments of periphyton thickness in approximate proportion to areas covered / not covered with periphyton.

title: Didymosphenia geminata monitoring in the Kootenai system (2.0) - Montana Fish, Wildlife and Parks (MFWP)
